google.title: Learn English with WSE
google.description:
LEARN ENGLISH ANYTIME, ANYWHERE WITH WALL STREET ENGLISH
Our English course is built around you. Beginner or advanced, you can learn at your own pace with teaching that fits around your schedule.

Wall Street English offers a proven English language learning method that guarantees results and makes learning English a more effective, supportive, and entertaining experience so you stay motivated to study and achieve your goals.

START STUDYING AT WALL STREET ENGLISH
The Learn English app is only available to people currently studying at Wall Street English. 

Not a student yet? Join us at wallstreetenglish.com

GET RESULTS WITH THE LEARN ENGLISH APP 
Our App features 20 levels of English learning aligned with CEFR standards: A1 to C1. It is a comprehensive and interactive course designed to study English on the go on your phone or tablet.

⭐ “Make it Big” English TV Show 
Immerse yourself in English with our own English TV series. You’ll start learning the second you’ll start watching! It’s a fun, fast and effective way to dive into the language.

⭐ Flexible Lessons 
With our method, you learn to listen and speak first. You’ll discuss the TV series language you’ve seen and complete interactive exercises to check your understanding and build your confidence.

Our automated speech-recognition software and role-play activities mean you can start speaking English from day one – and perfect your pronunciation while you do it.

⭐ Interactive Exercises 
Complete English grammar lessons and other English language exercises, and get instant feedback on your performance in your digital student workbooks.

⭐ Live Classes 
Whether you book in a school, a digital classroom or both, you’ll have small classes, highly-qualified teachers and a personal coach. So, you can learn real English – and feel confident speaking it.

⭐ Personalized Student Dashboard 
Access your personalized dashboard and get reminders for upcoming English classes and events so you never miss out on anything.

Track your activity and review your progress as you improve your English to achieve your personal learning goals.

ABOUT WALL STREET ENGLISH
Since 1972, Wall Street English helps people go further with English by offering an immersive, integrated and unmatched method. Our English learning experience has helped millions of people get great results, on their own terms.

We help you go further by going further ourselves – constantly innovating and creating new ways to make learning fun, flexible and effective. Tell us your ambition and we’ll get you there.

Find out more at wallstreetenglish.com
